text: avan paṟaññu: veḷḷattil ninn enikk rakṣanalkunna valla malayiluṁ ñān abhayaṁ prāpiccukeāḷḷāṁ. addēhaṁ paṟaññu: allāhuvinṟe kalpanayil ninn inn rakṣanalkān ārumilla; avan karuṇa ceytavarkkeāḻike. (appēāḻēkkuṁ) avar raṇṭ pērkkumiṭayil tiramāla maṟayiṭṭu. aṅṅane avan mukki naśippikkappeṭṭavaruṭe kūṭṭattilāyi
